trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"> </xref> händelser i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: Detta gör att du kan hantera flera händelsetyper med en händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>Egenskaper för att avgöra vilken som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>händelsen inträffar efter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du hanterar händelser finns [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Värden för den nya instansen har initierats till de angivna parametervärdena.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för `tabPage` i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger vilken händelse inträffar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> händelsen inträffar för.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det nollbaserade indexet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>
